name: Bali, Indonesia
description: A tropical paradise known for stunning beaches, temples, and rice terraces.
fun_fact: Bali has over 10,000 temples!

name: Reykjavik, Iceland
description: Home to glaciers, geysers, and the Northern Lights.
fun_fact: Iceland uses geothermal energy for nearly all its electricity.

name: Kyoto, Japan
description: Famous for its classical Buddhist temples and gardens.
fun_fact: Kyoto has over 1,600 Buddhist temples!

name: Maui, Hawaii
description: Stunning beaches, waterfalls, and outdoor adventures await.
fun_fact: Maui is known for its world-famous sunrise at Haleakalā.

name: Cape Town, South Africa
description: A vibrant city with stunning views of Table Mountain and unique wildlife.
fun_fact: Cape Town is one of the world's most biodiverse regions.

name: Queenstown, New Zealand
description: Known as the adventure capital of the world with activities like bungee jumping and skiing.
fun_fact: The world's first commercial bungee jump was in Queenstown!

name: Cusco, Peru
description: The gateway to Machu Picchu and rich in Incan history.
fun_fact: Cusco was the historic capital of the Inca Empire.

name: Santorini, Greece
description: Known for its iconic white-washed buildings and stunning sunsets.
fun_fact: Santorini was formed by a volcanic eruption.

name: Banff, Canada
description: A stunning mountain town in the Canadian Rockies, perfect for skiing and hiking.
fun_fact: Banff National Park is Canada's oldest national park.

name: Marrakech, Morocco
description: A city of vibrant souks, stunning palaces, and desert landscapes.
fun_fact: Marrakech is known as the 'Red City' because of its red sandstone buildings.

name: Phuket, Thailand
description: Famous for its stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and clear blue waters.
fun_fact: Phuket is home to one of the world's largest Buddha statues.

name: Paris, France
description: Known as the City of Light, Paris is home to iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre.
fun_fact: Paris was originally a Roman city called Lutetia.

name: Sydney, Australia
description: Home to the Sydney Opera House and Bondi Beach.
fun_fact: Sydney is built around the largest natural harbor in the world.

name: Tokyo, Japan
description: A bustling metropolis blending modern innovation with traditional culture.
fun_fact: Tokyo has the world's busiest pedestrian crossing, Shibuya Crossing.

name: Florence, Italy
description: Renowned as the birthplace of the Renaissance, with incredible art and architecture.
fun_fact: The entire city center of Florence is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Famous for its Carnival festival, Christ the Redeemer statue, and stunning beaches.
fun_fact: Rio's Carnival is the largest carnival in the world.

name: Amsterdam, Netherlands
description: Known for its picturesque canals, historic museums, and tulip fields.
fun_fact: Amsterdam has more bikes than people!

name: Cape Cod, USA
description: A coastal getaway known for its charming villages and sandy beaches.
fun_fact: Cape Cod has some of the oldest lighthouses in the United States.

name: Petra, Jordan
description: An ancient city carved into rose-red cliffs, known as the 'Lost City.'
fun_fact: Petra was featured in the movie Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade.

name: Galápagos Islands, Ecuador
description: Famous for its unique wildlife and volcanic landscapes.
fun_fact: The Galápagos inspired Charles Darwin's theory of evolution.
